summary: This bill, the Communities of Recovery Reauthorization Act of 2025, seeks to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize grants for building communities of recovery. It specifically addresses Section 547(f) of the Act and proposes to increase funding for these grants, replacing the previous funding levels for 2019-2023 with increased funding for fiscal years 2026-2030. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on April 7, 2025.
